formula: Number of 7-subsequences of [ 1, n ] with just 2 contiguous pairs; g.f. 2*(3+2x)*x^2/(1-x)^6.a(n) = 2*A006411(n+1).a(n) = C(n+1, 3)*C(n+2, 2) - _Zerinvary Lajos_, May 13 2005, corrected by _R. J. Mathar_, Feb 13 2016
